displayProperties.name: Empath

displayProperties.description:
You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

You must equip Anti-Overload and Anti-Unstoppable mods to your arms armor to defeat them. These mods come from the Seasonal Artifact.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description: You will face [Disruption] Overload and [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.
displayProperties.name: Champion Foes

displayProperties.description: Extra Shields
displayProperties.name: Hero Modifiers

displayProperties.description: Certain foes are stealthy when at a distance. They become visible when near a Guardian.
displayProperties.name: Subtle Foes

displayProperties.description: All Vanguard Rank point gains are increased!
displayProperties.name: Increased Vanguard Rank

displayProperties.description: All Nightfall loot drops are doubled.
displayProperties.name: Double Nightfall Drops

displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with a Solar weapon now applies scorch to your targets, but your foes also now apply scorch to you when they deal Solar or explosive damage.
displayProperties.name: Ashes to Ashes

displayProperties.description: Arc and Stasis abilities recharge faster, but you receive more damage from both elements.
displayProperties.name: Lightning Crystals

displayProperties.description: +25% Arc damage dealt and +50% Arc damage received.
displayProperties.name: Acute Arc Burn

displayProperties.description: A long-hidden stronghold sacred to the Awoken of the Reef.
displayProperties.name: The Dreaming City

displayProperties.description: The Corrupted
